title: Financial Resolutions For 2015, Seniors And Divorce, And More
teaser: Spending less money and saving more is a popular New Year’s resolution, but it may not be as easy as it sounds. John Munson’s guest financial planner explains why she says simplicity is the key to getting your finances under control. Plus, she discusses the financial challenges facing divorced seniors, repaying credit card debt, renting a home versus buying one, and answers your personal finance questions.
